Package org.terasology.moduletestingenvironment

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IsolatedMTEExtension
    Subclass of MTEExtension which isolates all test cases by creating a new engine for each test.
    ModuleTestingEnvironment Deprecated.
    Use the MTEExtension or IsolatedMTEExtension instead with JUnit5.
    ModuleTestingHelper
    Helpers for use in module tests.
    MTEExtension
    Junit 5 Extension for using ModuleTestingHelper in your test.
    TestEventReceiver<T extends org.terasology.entitySystem.event.Event>
    Test helper for listening to Events
    TestingStateHeadlessSetup
